{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA9500 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin=B01LZJY41G,B017NT8Q24 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/29/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117B |manuf_rev=AC44 -88 |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA9500V2 |ic_id=3839A-EA9500V2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1645, 639678-01, Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58BVG0S3HTA00 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1645 P30, 638851-05 3; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1645 P30, 638851-05 3; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1645 P30, 638851-05 3; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134;BCM53134OKFBG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, NitroQAM |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• 2x '''2165''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• 1x '''1000''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''5400 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC5400 MU-MIMO Tri-Band Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9500/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA9500|pid=01t34000003qSnmAAE}} *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA9500V2 Q87-EA9500V2], [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3442917 FCC label] - PSU 12V/5A {{see also|Arcadyan|Linksys|Linksys EA9500}} *[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3442860 FCC Doc] - Manuf. [[Arcadyan]] WG9117BAC44 -88 :"PN: 141911720044J R0A1" is silkscreened on the LED board. :"PN: 141911720048J R0A2" is silkscreened on the main board. FCC documents also apply to: *[[Linksys EA9400 v2]] - NitroQAM disabled for 2.4GHz 802.11n *[[Linksys EA9500S]] - alternate name for this product {{WiFiCert|WFA71320|06/07/2017}} *Web GUI: http://LinksysSmartWiFi.com ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm49408 BCM4908] @1.8GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A53) *Switch: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/ethernet-connectivity/switch-fabric/bcm53134 BCM53134] Six-Port GbE Switch ([https://docs.broadcom.com/docs/53134-PB101-R Datasheet]) :4x GbE PHY integrated, 1x RGMII and 1x RGMII/SGMII+ (1/2.5Gbps) ===See also=== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] __NOTOC__
